div.p: The left col can be used for navigation links, search box etc.

div.h3: Two Column - Left Column Static with Header Bar
div.p: The left column is absolutly positioned and is a fixed width. It won't move.

The header row and content column, which you are reading from, are flexible. They will automatically change shape, width can be controlled by setting appropriate margins or an actual width can be specified if required.
This template has been tested in:

ol.li: Defined zero for the body to fix a problem in Opera.

div.p: Dzig alta in mac sin i tig a athar & a mathar icon airdig i m-Maig Muirthemne, ocus adfeta dz sczla na maccaemi i n-Emain. Dzig is amlaid domeill Conchobar in rigi, o ro gab rzgi in rz, .i. mar atraig fzchetzir czsta & cangni in choicid d'ordugud. In lz do raind i trz asa athlil: cetna trian de fzchetzir ic fegad na maccaem ic imbirt chless cluchi & immanae, in trian tanaise dond lz ic imbirt brandub & fidchell, & in trian dedenach ic tochathim bzd & lenna, con-dageib cotlud for czch, aes czuil & airfitid dia thalgud fri sodain. Ciataim ane ar longais riam reme dabiur brzthir, ar Fergus, na fuil in hErind no i n-Albain zclach macsamla Conchobair.

Ocus adfeta don mac sin sczla na macezem & na maccraide i n-Emain, & radis in mac bec ria mathair ar co n-digsed dz chluchi do chluchemaig na Emna. Romoch duitsiu sain a meic bic, ar a mathair, co n-deoch anruth do anrothaib. Ulad lett no choimthecht ecin do chaimthechtaib Conchobair, do chor th' aesma & t'imdegla for in maccraid. Czan lim-sa di sodain a mathair, ar in mac bec, & ni biu-sa oca idnaide acht tecoisc-siu dam-sa cia airm itz Emain. Is czan uait, ar a mathair, airm in-das-fil. Sliab Fzait etrut & Emain. Dobzr-sa ardmes furri amne, ar esium.
